entity_types.name: AI Tool
entity_types.description: Specific software, platforms, or general AI technologies that leverage artificial intelligence to assist with various tasks. This includes large language models (LLMs) and specialized AI applications.
common_contexts: AI tools to help with my code

entity_types.name: Research Method
entity_types.description: Systematic approaches, techniques, or procedures used to collect, analyze, and interpret data in research studies.
common_contexts: most challenging aspect of that method
quantitative methods are most frequently used

entity_types.name: Researcher
entity_types.description: Individuals who conduct, manage, or consume research, including various roles and levels of experience within an organization.
common_contexts: skillset development among the younger folks
people on my teams do that research

entity_types.name: Organization
entity_types.description: Institutions or entities that conduct, sponsor, or are impacted by research, or provide services related to research.
common_contexts: implementing AI very much in Arroyo
Secretary of the Army wants Palantir and not RAND

entity_types.name: Research Task
entity_types.description: Specific activities or steps involved in the execution of a research project, often areas where AI tools are being applied or considered.
common_contexts: biggest investments in time and energy
battle rhythm, where AI automation could be helpful
harder to outsource to an ai tool

entity_types.name: Research Challenge or Benefit
entity_types.description: Difficulties, risks, or advantages encountered by researchers or organizations when conducting research or integrating AI tools.
common_contexts: risk is that we will end up utilizing AI
donâ€™t want to be left behind

entity_types.name: Research Data
entity_types.description: Raw or processed information collected, used, or generated during research.

entity_types.name: Research Output/Product
entity_types.description: Tangible deliverables or results produced from research activities.

relationship_types.name: Uses
relationship_types.description: A Researcher or Organization employs an AI Tool or Research Method.

example_relationships.context: researchers that are using the subscription based ai products
I have used AI tools to help with my code

relationship_types.name: Impacts
relationship_types.description: An AI Tool or Research Method affects a Research Task, Researcher, Organization, or Research Challenge/Benefit.

example_relationships.context: AI for a literature review that would have taken a RA 20 days so benefits of cost savings

example_relationships.target: career development and skillset development among the younger folks
example_relationships.context: I worry about career development and skillset development among the younger folks

relationship_types.name: Experiences
relationship_types.description: A Researcher encounters a Research Challenge or Benefit.

example_relationships.target: career development and skillset development among the younger folks
example_relationships.context: I worry about career development and skillset development among the younger folks
researchers are increasingly concerned about is data mining

relationship_types.name: Performs
relationship_types.description: A Researcher carries out a Research Task.

example_relationships.context: We do a lot of interviews and the coding is uneven in quality.
I do a lot of modeling, simulation coding

relationship_types.name: Supports
relationship_types.description: An AI Tool assists with a Research Task.

example_relationships.context: AI for a literature review

example_relationships.target: writing like any type of code
example_relationships.context: AI has been really helpful with writing like any type of code

relationship_types.name: Poses Challenge To
relationship_types.description: A Research Challenge or Benefit affects a Researcher, Organization, Research Task, or Research Method.

example_relationships.context: I worry about career development and skillset development among the younger folks.
risk to our research being utilized opportunistically by AI company to get ahead and to put us out of business.

relationship_types.name: Conducts
relationship_types.description: An Organization performs a Research Task or employs a Research Method.

example_relationships.context: RAND maintained for the army called JICM, a modeling and simulation tool
Center for Causal Influence... host seminars and journal clubs to bring the methods to others

relationship_types.name: Requires
relationship_types.description: A Research Method necessitates specific Research Tasks or Research Data.

example_relationships.context: historical analysis... involves document review, archival, interview
biggest investments in time and energy are when new data collection is involved

relationship_types.name: Generates
relationship_types.description: A Research Task produces Research Data or Research Output/Product.

example_relationships.context: data collection... you get answers back
AI transcribed the meeting minutes put it in like here are the key decisions.

relationship_types.name: Contains
relationship_types.description: A Research Output/Product includes Research Data.

example_relationships.target: cost of different European force posture options
example_relationships.context: report on the cost of different European force posture options
spit out in a spreadsheet a once sentence summary of the paper

relationship_types.name: Provides Guidance On
relationship_types.description: An Organization or Researcher offers guidance or training on AI Tools or Research Methods.

example_relationships.context: Center for Causal Influence... host seminars and journal clubs to bring the methods to others
illustrated use case guides for, OK. Let's say you wanna use large language models to do X.

relationship_types.name: Affects
relationship_types.description: A Research Challenge or Benefit influences a Research Task or Research Method.

example_relationships.context: The coding is uneven in quality.
biggest investments in time and energy are when new data collection is involved

relationship_types.name: Produces
relationship_types.description: A Researcher creates a Research Output/Product.

example_relationships.context: Alex Evans wrote on Iran and Russia that made a huge splash.
I've been writing proposals non-stop.

relationship_types.name: Utilizes
relationship_types.description: A Research Task employs a Research Method.

example_relationships.context: interview coding, something way better than Dedoose.
when we finish collecting the data, I have done some quantitative analysis on the results that we got.
